channel.title: CVE Feed for Laybuy -- Laybuy Payment Extension for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-21745|2024-01-08T16:51:33.580Z -- Laybuy -- Laybuy Payment Extension for WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Laybuy Laybuy Payment Extension for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Laybuy Payment Extension for WooCommerce: from n/a through 5.3.9.
